steps.name: the browser is open and the URL is entered
the valid username and password are entered
the lead page text is validated
the lead add page text is validated
enter the all necessary data to create lead
verify the lead view page is displayed
verify the lead edit page is displayed
select one lead and the Delete button is clicked
